name: CyDrums
description: Expressive Drum Synthesizer. Wavetable x Velocity & Pressure Modulation = 4D Drum Sounds That React, Transform, and Evolve. 22 Custom-Built Sound Structures Tailored to Each Instrument for Endless Sonic Possibilities. Versatile Effects & Flexible Routing. Powerful 8-Track Beat Making. Endless Creative Possibilities
